en: Paul, a prisoner of Christ Jesus, and Timothy our brother, to Philemon our beloved and fellow-worker,
hmr: Paula Isu Krista mi intâng le ei unaupa Timothe chun:

en: and to Apphia our sister, and to Archippus our fellow-soldier, and to the church in thy house:
hmr: Kan dittak le kan sininrimpui Philemon kuoma dâm, kan farnu Aphi kuoma dâm, kan sipaipui Arkippa kuoma dâm, i ina kohran inkhâwmhai kuoma dâm:

en: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
hmr: Pathien ei Pa le Lalpa Isu Krista kuoma inthawka lunginsietna le inremna in kuomah um raw se.

en: I thank my God always, making mention of thee in my prayers,
hmr: Ka ṭawngṭainahaia chun i hming lam rawpin ka Pathien kuoma chun lâwmthu ka hril hlak a.

en: hearing of thy love, and of the faith which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus, and toward all the saints;
hmr: Lalpa Isu tieng le mi inthienghai po po tiengah hmangaina le ringna i nei chu hre zingin;

en: that the fellowship of thy faith may become effectual, in the knowledge of every good thing which is in you, unto Christ.
hmr: i ringna mîn ṭâwmpuina chu nangnia um thil ṭha tinrêng hriet famkimna kawnga chun, Krista tienga a ṭhathnem theina dingin;

en: For I had much joy and comfort in thy love, because the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through thee, brother.
hmr: unaupa, nangma zâra mi in- thienghai lungril a har ta leiin i hma- ngainaa chun ka hlimin ka thla- muong bêk bêk a nih.

en: Wherefore, though I have all boldness in Christ to enjoin thee that which is befitting,
hmr: Chuleiin, a âwmtâwk chu thaw dinga thupêk chu Kristaa chun ngam bêk bêk lang khawm,

en: yet for love’s sake I rather beseech, being such a one as Paul the aged, and now a prisoner also of Christ Jesus:
hmr: hmangaina leiin (Paula tarsie rau ka nih, tuhin Krista mi intâng ka lo ni ta nâka chu) a ngênin ka ngên lem che,

en: I beseech thee for my child, whom I have begotten in my bonds, Onesimus,
hmr: ka nau Onesima, kawl bun puma ka inei ta ding hin i kuomah ka ngênpêk a nih.

en: who once was unprofitable to thee, but now is profitable to thee and to me:
hmr: Ama chu inhma khan i ta dingin a ṭangkai nawh a, tu ruok hin chu kei le nanga ta dingin a ṭangkai.

en: whom I have sent back to thee in his own person, that is, my very heart:
hmr: Ama ngei, ka lungril ngei hi, i kuomah ka hung tir kîr nâwk a nih:

en: whom I would fain have kept with me, that in thy behalf he might minister unto me in the bonds of the gospel:
hmr: ama chu Chanchin Ṭhaa kawl ka bunnaa hin nanga aia rawng a mi bâwlpêk theina dingin ka kuoma inumtir zing ka nuom hleh a,

en: but without thy mind I would do nothing; that thy goodness should not be as of necessity, but of free will.
hmr: nisienlakhawm, i lungsietna chu lunginsiet luitir ang ni loin, i thu ang a ni thei lemna dingin i thu naw chun iengkhawm ka thaw nuom nawh.

en: For perhaps he was therefore parted from thee for a season, that thou shouldest have him for ever;
hmr: Sâwt nawtê a ṭhe che hi kum- khuoa ama chu i nei sawngna ai a ni lem rawi mawh;

en: no longer as a servant, but more than a servant, a brother beloved, specially to me, but how much rather to thee, both in the flesh and in the Lord.
hmr: ama chu suok ang ni loa, suok nêka ṭha, unau dittak ang lemin ka ta dingin dittak a ni bîk a, nanga ta ding lem chun tisaa le Lalpaa chun a va ni nâwk zuol âwm de!

en: If then thou countest me a partner, receive him as myself.
hmr: Chuongchun, ruola i mi ngai chun keia angin ama hi lo lâwm la.

en: But if he hath wronged thee at all, or oweth thee aught, put that to mine account;
hmr: Chun, i chungah iengkhawm suksuolin amanih, i iengkhat amanih a bat chun keia batah ruot rawh.

en: I Paul write it with mine own hand, I will repay it: that I say not unto thee that thou owest to me even thine own self besides.
hmr: Kei Paulain keima kut ngeia ka ziek a ni hi; keiin thung pêk ka tih, ka kuoma nangma ngei khawm în batzie hril che lem chu ka ni nawh.

en: Yea, brother, let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my heart in Christ.
hmr: Anih, unaupa, nanga leiin Lalpaa chun mîn lâwmtir la, Kristaa chun ka lungril sukhar rawh.

en: Having confidence in thine obedience I write unto thee, knowing that thou wilt do even beyond what I say.
hmr: Ka hril nêka nasa lem hmanin thâwng i tih ti ka hriet leiin, i awi ringin i kuomah ka ziek a nih.

en: But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I hope that through your prayers I shall be granted unto you.
hmr: Iengkhawm ni sienla, chu chau chu thaw loin, tlungin ding khawm mi lo buotsaipêk bawk la, in ṭawngṭainahai leiin in kuomah pêk ka ni ding a nih ti ka ring sih a.

en: Epaphras, my fellow-prisoner in Christ Jesus, saluteth thee;
hmr: Epaphra, Krista Isua ka in- tângpuipa hin chibai a bûk che:

en: and so do Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, Luke, my fellow-workers.
hmr: ka sinthawpui Marka hai, Aristarka hai, Dema hai, Luka hai khawmin chuong ang bawkin an bûk che.

en: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
hmr: Ei Lalpa Isu Krista lunginsietna in thlarau kuomah um raw se. Amen.
